use.flag: Rollback commit for reliable working patches and for missing symbols avoidance.

Build with Full RELRO, noexecstack, SSP. For the non-hardened profile, set USE_HARDENED_PROFILE_DEFAULTS=1 in make.conf to use the hardened profile settings or fallback to the browser defaults. See ebuild for details.

Use libunwind instead of libgcc_s for stack unwinding, thus avoiding a dependency on gcc.
